subtitle:
The secret to this recipe is to use fish as fresh as possible or if using frozen fish make sure it is thawed first.
You can also use tilapa or grey mullet for this recipe.

method.text: Mix together the mushrooms, shallots, lime juice and rind. Use half this mixture to stuff the fish. Keep remainder for side salad.
Put fish in barbecue wire baskets or wrap in lightly oiled foil. Cook on barbecue or under moderate grill for 10-15 min each side.
Serve with wedges of lime. Add some salad leaves to remaining mushrooms to make the salad.

title: Barbecued red snapper with mushroom stuffing
